data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Famalicao with the kick-off.
Dyego Sousa of Famalicao smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 2, Famalicao's Dyego Sousa gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Famalicao.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 7, Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
In the minute 10, Ruben Lameiras (Famalicao) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Famalicao to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 12, Goal! Maritimo take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Joel.
That's a fine assist from Zainadine Junior.
Famalicao's Fernando Valenzuela gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 13, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Maritimo a goal kick.
Can Maritimo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Edwin Herrera (Famalicao) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 16, Maritimo are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in Maritimo.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Joel gets his shot on target but fails to score for Maritimo.
In the minute 22, Famalicao advance rapidly upfield but Luis Miguel Branco Godinho blows for offside.
Jorge Correa for Maritimo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Famalicao have a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the home team a throw-in.
Maritimo drives forward and Rodrigo Pinho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Famalicao in their own half.
Corner awarded to Famalicao.
Famalicao have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
In the minute 28, Srdan Babic (Famalicao) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
Great play from Ivan Jaime to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Famalicao.
In the minute 29, Maritimo needs to be cautious. Famalicao have an attacking throw-in.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Maritimo throw-in in Famalicao's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
In the minute 30, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao just outside Maritimo's area.
Franck Bambock is booked for the away team.
In the minute 32, Famalicao take a 2-1 lead thanks to Fernando Valenzuela.
Famalicao to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Famalicao's Edwin Herrera breaks free at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Maritimo.
Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, Free kick Maritimo.
Maritimo are coming forward and Rodrigo Pinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
In the minute 39, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Jorge Correa (Maritimo) has received a yellow card from Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao, Famalicao push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 42, In Vila Nova de Famalicao Famalicao drive forward through Ruben Lameiras. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Famalicao throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Maritimo a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Famalicao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 44, The match at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao has been interrupted briefly for a check on Joaquin Pereyra, who is down injured.
At Estadio Municipal de Famalicao the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Famalicaoâ€™s Joaquin Pereyra is on his feet again at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
In the minute 45, Famalicao have a goal kick.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho blows to end the first-half.
Maritimo have kicked-off the second half at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Famalicao.
In the minute 46, Lito Vidigal is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao with Rene replacing Franck Bambock.
Lito Vidigal (Maritimo) is making a second substitution, with Francois Xavier Fumu Tamuzo replacing Jorge Correa.
In the minute 47, Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Maritimo drive upfield and Joel gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Famalicao defender.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
In the minute 48, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Famalicao have a dangerous throw-in.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Famalicao close to the penalty box.
Can Famalicao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Maritimo's half?
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
In the minute 53, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Maritimo.
In the minute 56, Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Famalicao is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Famalicao.
In the minute 59, Famalicao push upfield but Luis Miguel Branco Godinho quickly pulls them for offside.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao Famalicao attack through Gil Dias. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 61, It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila Nova de Famalicao.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Maritimo.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Maritimo.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Famalicao to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 65, Jordao is on a sub for Ivan Jaime for Famalicao.
In the minute 67, In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Famalicao throw-in in Maritimo's half.
In the minute 69, The home team have replaced Fernando Valenzuela with Jhonata Robert. This is the second substitution made today by Joao Pedro Sousa.
Famalicao make their third substitution with Marcello Trotta replacing Dyego Sousa.
Famalicao drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Famalicao in the half of Maritimo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Maritimo at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Milson is replacing Pedro Pelagio for Maritimo at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Famalicao goal kick.
Free kick for Famalicao in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a Maritimo throw-in in Famalicao's half.
In the minute 76, Maritimo are in shooting range from this free kick.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao Maritimo attack through Claudio Winck. The finish is off target, however.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards Famalicao a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Famalicao in the half of Maritimo.
Lito Vidigal (Maritimo) is making a fourth substitution, with Ali Alipour replacing Rodrigo Pinho.
Famalicao will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Maritimo.
In the minute 81, Milson for Maritimo drives towards goal at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 82, Andrija Lukovic is replacing Joaquin Pereyra for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
The home team have replaced Ruben Lameiras with Henrique Trevisan. This is the fifth substitution made today by Joao Pedro Sousa.
Throw-in Famalicao.
In the minute 84, Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Famalicao's half?
Throw-in for Famalicao at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao.
Maritimo drive forward but Claudio Winck is judged offside.
In the minute 86, Free kick Famalicao.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
Maritimo have been awarded a corner by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho.
In the minute 88, Luis Miguel Branco Godinho awards the home team a throw-in.
Famalicao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lito Vidigal is making the team's fifth substitution at Estadio Municipal de Famalicao with Jean Cleber replacing Jean Irmer.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Famalicao territory.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Maritimo.
In Vila Nova de Famalicao a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho signals a free kick to Famalicao in their own half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Luis Miguel Branco Godinho blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Gil Dias (Famalicao) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Jhonata Robert for Famalicao has been booked by Luis Miguel Branco Godinho and receives a first yellow card.
